title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart of the Day for Oct. 27
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart of the Day for Oct. 27
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUESTS:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his Chart of the Day "Unraveling the CAPE makes U.S. stocks look costly." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.\u0010\u0010Eric Schoenstein\u0010Portfolio Manager\u0010Jensen Investment Management \u0010Discussing why earnings matter in the markets and investing in Mastercard.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
